name: Cursed Hero of the Past
description:
What happens if you combine 2D platformers and time travel? 

Cursed Hero of The Past is a 2D platformer and puzzle game, where you must use your ability to create a clone of yourself going back in time in order to beat the puzzles of a cyberpunk world. You must learn how dodge lasers and be fast, so that you can step on all the switches and open the door of the room. Can you go through all 6 rooms and prove that you can control the time travelling?
